HI.MI.summary: Health Italia S.p.A. promotes supplementary health plans and solutions for the prevention and well-being of the individual in Italy. The company offers administrative, settlement, IT, and consultancy services to mutual aid companies, health funds, and assistance funds. It also manages corporate welfare plans and carries out training activities. The company was formerly known as Health Holding Group S.p.A. and changed its name to Health Italia S.p.A. in 2015. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Formello, Italy.
